attributes.action: Stop the bbc from making over 75 pay for their  tv licence
attributes.additional_details: . Please show your support to get this scrapped before or starts
attributes.background: Millions of people over the age of 75 will soon have to pay for their tv licence under plans announced today by the BBC . The bbc is changing its policy on free tv licences for people over the age of 75 . The blanket free licence are being scrapped from next June
